com.vgrs.xcode.jnlp
Class Animation

java.lang.Object

                          +--com.vgrs.xcode.jnlp.Animation
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.SwingConstants
public class Animation
extends javax.swing.JLabel

A class used to implement a browser like animation that only runs during calculation. After much experimenting with Java's Thread Priority support, and much failure, we've abandoned that approach. Instead, this object offers a next() method which allows callers to explicitly show the next image. This way a single Thread can control it's own process as well as the animation. After instantiating, a call to the Animation's next() method should be placed somewhere in the main calculation loop.

See Also:

Field Detail

SCALE_TYPE

public static final int SCALE_TYPE
All images loaded are scaled to a certain dimension using the scaling algorithm specified by this constant.
This variable is hard coded to the value Image.SCALE_FAST
